ScenarioDef.label: Solitary Queen
ScenarioDef.description: You went under anesthetic for a minor surgery. Now you've awoken in a drop pod crashing into a distant planet. You're naked, alone, and totally unprepared. Can you survive?\n\nWarning: There is nothing fair about this scenario - it is extremely difficult and death can happen for any reason.

scenario.summary: Naked, alone, and utterly unprepared. Can you survive? Extremely difficult and unfair.

li.text:
It was supposed to be a minor surgery. Just an hour under anesthetic. You felt totally safe.

Now you've awoken inside a drop pod punching through the atmosphere of a distant rimworld.

Aside from a slick of mysterious goo all over your body, you are totally naked. With no preparation, no supplies, and no tools, can you survive?
